00015 class ParamHelpPrinter{
00016   const VParameterNode* p;
00017 public:
00018   ParamHelpPrinter(const VParameterNode* node) : p(node){}
00019   int operator()(const char*){ p->PrintHelp(); exit(0); }
00020 };
00021 
00022 int PrintProgramUsage(const char* dummy = "")
00023 {
00024   ConfigHandler::GetInstance()->PrintSwitches(true);
00025   return 0;
00026 }
00027 
00028 ConfigHandler::ConfigHandler() : 
00029   ParameterList("ConfigHandler","Global container for all parameters"), 
00030   _program_usage(""), _notes(), _default_cfg_file(), _saved_cfg()
00031 {
00032   AddCommandSwitch(' ',"cfg","Load global configuration data from <file>",
00033                    CommandSwitch::LoadConfigFile(this),
00034                    "file");
00035   AddCommandSwitch(' ',"saved-config",
00036                    "Load saved configuration from previous run from <file>",
00037                    CommandSwitch::DefaultRead<std::string>(_saved_cfg),
00038                    "file");
00039   AddCommandSwitch(' ',"show-parameters",
00040                    "Print information about available configuration parameters",
00041                    ParamHelpPrinter(this) );
00042   AddCommandSwitch('h',"help","Display this help page",
00043                    PrintProgramUsage) ;
00044   RegisterParameter("notes",_notes, "Generic notes about this run, etc");
00045   RegisterParameter("saved-config",_saved_cfg,
00046                     "Previously saved configuration file");
00047 }
00048 
00049 ConfigHandler::~ConfigHandler()
00050 {
00051   //delete the switches
00052   for(SwitchSet::iterator it = _switches.begin(); it != _switches.end(); it++){
00053     delete (*it);
00054   }
00055 }
00056 
00057 int ConfigHandler::RemoveCommandSwitch(char shortname, 
00058                                        const std::string& longname){
00059   
00060   for(SwitchSet::iterator it = _switches.begin(); it != _switches.end(); it++){
00061     if( (*it)->shortname == shortname && (*it)->longname == longname){
00062       delete (*it);
00063       _switches.erase(it);
00064       return 0;
00065     }
00066   }
00067   std::cerr<<"Unable to find switch "<<shortname<<","<<longname<<std::endl;
00068   return 1;
00069 }
00070 
00071 void ConfigHandler::PrintSwitches(bool quit)
00072 {
00073   if(quit)
00074     MessageHandler::GetInstance()->End();
00075   std::cout<<"Usage: "<<_program_usage<<std::endl;
00076   size_t maxlong = 0;
00077   size_t maxpar = 0;
00078   //struct winsize w;
00079   //ioctl(0,TIOCGWINSZ, &w);
00080   //size_t termsize=w.ws_col;
00081   size_t termsize = 80;
00082     
00083   
00084   
00085   for(SwitchSet::iterator it = _switches.begin(); it != _switches.end(); it++){
00086     maxlong = (maxlong > (*it)->longname.size() ? 
00087                    maxlong : (*it)->longname.size() );
00088     maxpar = (maxpar > (*it)->parameter.size() ? 
00089                    maxpar : (*it)->parameter.size() );
00090   }
00091   std::cout<<"Available Options:"<<std::endl;
00092   for(SwitchSet::iterator it = _switches.begin(); it != _switches.end(); it++){
00093     VCommandSwitch* cmd = *it;
00094     std::cout<<" ";
00095     if( cmd->shortname != ' ')
00096       std::cout<<'-'<<cmd->shortname;
00097     else
00098       std::cout<<"  ";
00099     
00100     if( cmd->shortname != ' ' && cmd->longname != "")
00101       std::cout<<',';
00102     else 
00103       std::cout<<' ';
00104     if( cmd->longname != "" ) 
00105       std::cout<<"--"<<cmd->longname;
00106     else
00107       std::cout<<"  ";
00108     for(size_t i=0; i < maxlong - cmd->longname.size(); i++)
00109       std::cout<<' ';
00110     if( cmd->parameter != "" )
00111       std::cout<<" <"<<cmd->parameter<<'>';
00112     else 
00113       std::cout<<"   ";
00114     for(size_t i=0; i < maxpar - cmd->parameter.size(); i++)
00115       std::cout<<' ';
00116     std::cout<<"  ";
00117     //insert line-breaks into helptext
00118     int offset=1+2+1+2+maxlong+3+maxpar+2+2; //final 2 for indent
00119     std::string spaces;
00120     spaces.assign(offset,' ');
00121     size_t length=termsize-offset;
00122     size_t mypos = 0;
00123     while(cmd->helptext.size()-mypos > length ){
00124       //look for a space and replace it with a line-break
00125       std::string chunk = cmd->helptext.substr(mypos, length);
00126       size_t spacepos = chunk.rfind(' ');
00127       if(spacepos == std::string::npos)
00128         break;
00129       std::cout<<chunk.substr(0,spacepos)<<"\n"<<spaces;
00130       mypos += spacepos+1;
00131     }
00132     std::cout<<cmd->helptext.substr(mypos)<<std::endl;
00133   }
00134   if(quit)
00135     exit(0);
00136 }
00137 
00138 int ConfigHandler::ProcessCommandLine(int& argc, char** argv)
00139 {
00140   int status = 0;
00141   try{
00142     //first, see if the --cfg switch was specified; if not, load the default
00143     bool cfgswitchfound = false;
00144     for(int arg = 1; arg<argc; arg++){
00145       if(std::string(argv[arg]) == "--cfg"){
00146         cfgswitchfound = true;
00147         break;
00148       }
00149     }
00150     if(!cfgswitchfound){
00151       if(_default_cfg_file != ""){
00152         Message(INFO)<<"No --cfg switch found; reading default file "
00153                      <<_default_cfg_file<<"...\n";
00154         ReadFromFile(_default_cfg_file.c_str());
00155       }
00156       else{
00157         Message(INFO)<<"No --cfg switch found and no default file specified; "
00158                      <<"using compiled defaults.\n";
00159       }
00160     }
00161     
00162     for(int arg = 1; arg<argc; arg++){
00163       if(status != 0){
00164         Message(ERROR)<<"Problem encountered while processing command line "
00165                       <<std::endl;
00166         return status;
00167       }
00168       if( argv[arg][0] != '-' ){
00169         //we're done with switches
00170         for( int i=arg; i<argc; i++){
00171           _cmd_args.push_back(argv[i]);
00172           argv[1 + i - arg] = argv[i];
00173         }
00174         //reset argc, argv to remove switches
00175         argc = 1 + argc - arg;
00176         break;
00177         //return _cmd_args.size();
00178       }
00179       
00180       if( argv[arg][1] == '-' ){
00181         //we are processing a long switch
00182         bool switchfound = false;
00183         std::string key(argv[arg]+2);
00184         for(SwitchSet::iterator it = _switches.begin(); it != _switches.end(); 
00185             it++){
00186           if( (*it)->longname != key)
00187             continue;
00188           
00189           switchfound = true;
00190           //check to see if we need a parameter
00191           bool need_parameter = ((*it)->parameter != "");
00192           bool next_is_parameter = ( arg != argc-1 && argv[arg+1][0] != '-');
00193           if( !need_parameter ){
00194             status = (*it)->Process(""); //needs dummy char*
00195             break;
00196           }
00197           else if( next_is_parameter){
00198             status = (*it)->Process(argv[++arg]);
00199             break;
00200           }
00201           else{
00202             //oops! we didn't get the parameter we need!
00203             Message e(EXCEPTION);
00204             e <<"Switch --" << key
00205               <<" is missing required parameter "
00206               << (*it)->parameter<<std::endl;
00207             throw std::invalid_argument(e.str());
00208           }
00209         }
00210         if(!switchfound){
00211           Message e(EXCEPTION);
00212           e<<argv[arg]<<" is not a valid switch!\n";
00213           throw std::invalid_argument(e.str());
00214         }
00215       }
00216       else{
00217         //we are dealing with short switches
00218         std::string shortkeys(argv[arg]+1);
00219         for(size_t i=0; i<shortkeys.size(); i++){
00220           bool switchfound = false;
00221           char key = shortkeys.at(i);
00222           for(SwitchSet::iterator it = _switches.begin(); 
00223               it != _switches.end(); it++){
00224             if( (*it)->shortname != key)
00225               continue;
00226             switchfound = true;
00227             //check to see if we need a parameter
00228             bool need_parameter = ((*it)->parameter != "");
00229             bool next_is_parameter = ( i == shortkeys.size() - 1 &&
00230                                        arg != argc-1 && 
00231                                        argv[arg+1][0] != '-' );
00232             if( !need_parameter ){
00233               status = (*it)->Process(""); //needs dummy char*
00234               break;
00235             }
00236             else if( next_is_parameter){
00237               status = (*it)->Process(argv[++arg]);
00238               break;
00239             }
00240             else{
00241               //oops! we didn't get the parameter we need!
00242               Message e(EXCEPTION);
00243               e <<"Switch -" << key
00244                 <<" is missing required parameter "
00245                 << (*it)->parameter<<std::endl;
00246               throw std::invalid_argument(e.str());
00247             }
00248           }
00249           if(!switchfound){
00250             Message e(EXCEPTION);
00251             e <<"-"<<key<<" is not a valid switch!\n";
00252             throw std::invalid_argument(e.str());
00253           }
00254         }
00255       }
00256     }
00257   } //end try block
00258   catch(std::exception& e){
00259     Message(EXCEPTION)<<"An error occurred processing command line arguments:\n"
00260                       <<e.what()<<std::endl;
00261     PrintSwitches(true);
00262   }
00263   if(status == 0 ) 
00264     argc = _cmd_args.size() + 1;
00265   else if(status < 0) return status;
00266   
00267   MessageHandler::GetInstance()->UpdateThreshold();
00268   return _cmd_args.size();
00269 }
00270 
00271 bool ConfigHandler::OrderCommandSwitchPointers::operator()
00272   (VCommandSwitch* a, VCommandSwitch* b )
00273 {
00274   //true is a < b; i.e. a comes before b
00275   //if shortname is blank, use the first letter of longname
00276   char shorta = (a->shortname == ' ' ? a->longname.at(0) : a->shortname);
00277   char shortb = (b->shortname == ' ' ? b->longname.at(0) : b->shortname);
00278   
00279   //first order by shortname
00280   if( shorta < shortb )
00281     return true;
00282   else if( shorta > shortb )
00283     return false;
00284   else {  
00285     //shortnames must be equal
00286     if( a->longname < b->longname)
00287       return true;
00288     else 
00289       return false;
00290   }
00291   //we shouldn't ever get here
00292   return false;
00293 }
